name: quiz-app
description: A quiz app on cats, demonstrating HTML, CSS, and JavaScript skills.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run mkdir && npm run build:css && npm run build:css:minified && npm run copyfiles && npm run build:js
scripts.watch: npm run watch:html & npm run watch:css & npm run watch:js
scripts.watch:css: npm run build:css && chokidar 'css/**/*.less' -c 'npm run build:css'
scripts.copyfiles: cp index.html build/index.html && cp ohhai-sarah6-new.jpg build/ohhai-sarah6-new.jpg
